snippet: AT&T has poured loads of money into advertising Nokia's new Lumia 900 phone, but if a visit to four stores in New York is any guide, AT&T store employees don't seem that sold on the device.
abstract: AT&T has poured loads of money into advertising Nokia's new Lumia 900 phone, but if a visit to four stores in New York is any guide, AT&T store employees don't seem that sold on the device.

headline.main: AT&T's Lumia Salespeople Don't Seem So Hot for the Phone
